title: All Or Nothing
lyrics:
We're sick as the devil and tired as sin
We're closer to love than we ever have been
They told us that fear was a howling wind
And if there was ever a storm we are weathering it
And all things we saw

They were not our fault

We're never taught how to love

And never got to be young



And if love is a war

It isn't love anymore

And the heart is a cage

If the heart doesn't change



And it's all or nothing now

Or it's all for nothing



My mother found solace in hiding her pain

My father a shepherd no sheep to his name



I learned to keep all my feelings inside

With a mother to face and a father to fight



Oh but if love is a war

It isn't love anymore

And the heart is a cage

If the heart doesn't change



And it's all or nothing now

Or it's all for nothing now

And it's all or nothing now

Or it's all for nothing



Oh woah oh, oh woah oh oh oh

Oh woah oh, oh woah oh oh oh



And I thought I heard your voice

Heard it raise above the grain

Thought I heard your voice

Thought I heard your voice say



It's all or nothing now

Or it's all for nothing



Oh woah oh, oh woah oh oh oh

Oh woah oh, oh woah oh oh oh

Oh woah oh, oh woah oh oh oh

Oh woah oh, oh woah oh oh oh
